name: Helen Guo
content: Using PostPilot for years. Good for re-engagement. And you can get creative with messaging.

name: Nathan Woods
content: Done some rad winbacks to days since purchase that have worked well. PostPilot team is one of my favs.

name: Chris Lander
content: +1 for PostPilot. Have only done small tests, but it's been wonderful. Their support is also top-notch. Super helpful every time I set something up.
